title: Subsidy to monopoly can correct inefficiency

content.prompt: Which of the following government actions can correct the inefficiency caused by the existence of a monopoly?

choices.label: Granting a per-unit subsidy on the monopolist’s output
Granting an annual lump-sum subsidy to the monopolist
Imposing a per-unit tax on the monopolist’s output
Imposing a price floor on the monopolist
